messages.title: Cut net migration to tens of thousands a year
messages.content: Verdict: Promise Broken. There are now almost 300,000 more people arriving in the UK every year.

messages.title: Act on the debt now
messages.content: Verdict: Promise Broken. George Osborne has borrowed more money than any government since the Second World War and the national debt now stands at a staggering £1.56 trillion.

messages.title: No top-down re-organisation of the NHS
messages.content: Verdict: Promise Broken. The independent Kings Fund has declared the NHS in the worst state it's been in twenty years. This comes after the government spent £3 billion on an unnecessary top-down re-organisation - money that could have been spent on the 25 cancer drugs they slashed from the Cancer Drugs Fund.

issues.economy: George Osborne has borrowed more money than any government since the Second World War and the national debt now stands at a staggering £1.56 trillion.
issues.health: The independent Kings Fund has declared the NHS in the worst state it's been in twenty years. This comes after the government spent £3 billion on an unnecessary top-down re-organisation.
issues.immigration: There are now almost 300,000 more people arriving in the UK every year.

leaflet.personalStatement: David Cameron has failed to deliver on his contract so I'll be taking his advice – the Conservatives won’t be getting my vote on Thursday. If politicians aren’t held to their word – they will always take our vote for granted.

images.caption: Pages from Peter Metcalfe's campaign leaflet discussing broken promises by David Cameron and the impact on NHS, debt, and immigration.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet includes a critique of promises made by David Cameron, indicating promises regarding immigration, national debt, and NHS restructuring were broken.
